sentence.Network_en: Somehow he always manages to outwit his opponents.
sentence.Network_cn: 他反正总能设法智胜对手。

sentence.Network_en: To win the presidency he had first to outwit his rivals within the Socialist Party.
sentence.Network_cn: 要想赢得总统之位，他必须首先智胜其在社会党内的竞选对手。

sentence.Network_en: This was a crafty manoeuvre to outwit his pursuers.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一个高招,他以此骗倒了追逐他的人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ★常用口语词汇23[1]-英语口语-无忧考网 ... outset n. 开端, 开始 outwit v. 瞒骗, 以智取胜 overbearing adj. 傲慢的.
以o开头的英语英文单词 ... outweigh 超过 outwit 以机智胜过 ovation 热烈的欢迎，鼓掌.
★常用口语词汇23[1]-英语口语-无忧考网 ... outset n. 开端, 开始 outwit v. 瞒骗, 以智取胜 overbearing adj. 傲慢的.
Toefl Words Integrated_百度文库 ... offshoot（ 分支） outwit（ 哄骗） gratify（ 使满足）.

list.abs: but since a story such as this would have helped me at various times in my life , I figured I' d make it as clear as I think would be necessary for someone else to benefit from its contents , and to possibly outwit fate and conditioning in their own way.
The criminal outwitted the police and escaped., 那罪犯耍花招瞒过了警察 , 逃跑了.
To trick or fool by ingenuity or cunning outwit ., 使上当以诡计或奸诈迷惑或愚弄;
Can any man outwit nature ?, 有没有人能够战胜自然呢?

entry.def: If you outwit someone, you use your intelligence or a clever trick to defeat them or to gain an advantage over them.

example.ex: To win the presidency he had first to outwit his rivals within the Socialist Party...
example.tran: 要想赢得总统之位，他必须首先智胜其在社会党内的竞选对手。

example.ex: Seeing how cleverly he had been outwitted he made no complaint.
example.tran: 看到自己在计谋上完全不是对手，他甘拜下风。

auth_sentence.content: Outwit the silly non-scientist with your well-defended worldview.
auth_sentence.res_content: Outwit the silly non-scientist with your well-defended worldview.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Outwit the silly non-scientist with your well-defended worldview.

auth_sentence.content: Did you find a way to outwit Bell's inequality experiment?
auth_sentence.res_content: Did you find a way to outwit Bell's inequality experiment?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Did you find a way to outwit Bell's inequality experiment?

auth_sentence.content: Hopefully the owner was not some perv he would have to outwit.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hopefully the owner was not some perv he would have to outwit.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hopefully the owner was not some perv he would have to outwit.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"出去.过时,外面"; 2. 表示"超过.过度"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 室外的, 户外的, 野外的
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+door门→adj.室外的, 户外的, 野外的
out出去.过时,外面+er→adj.外部的,外面的,外层的
out出去.过时,外面+going走→走出来→心胸宽→待人友善的
out出去.过时,外面+land地+ish……的→外地来的→奇异的
out出去.过时,外面+ward方向→向外的
out超过.过度+size范围→范围超出
out超过.过度+standing标准的→adj.突出的, 显著的
out出去.过时,外面→adv.出外;在外 v.公布
out出去.过时,外面+door户+s→n.户外 adv.在户外, 在野外
out出去.过时,外面+side旁边→在外边
out出去.过时,外面+ward方向→向外的
out出去.过时,外面+break中断→事情断裂→爆发
out出去.过时,外面+door户+s→n.户外 adv.在户外, 在野外
out出去.过时,外面+flow流→流出

stems_affixes.value_cn: 外出, 旅行, 散步
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+ing状态→n.外出, 旅行, 散步
out出去.过时,外面+let表名词→n.出口, 出路
out出去.过时,外面+line线条→划出线条→大纲

stems_affixes.value_cn: 景色, 风光, 观点
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+look看→n.景色, 风光, 观点

stems_affixes.value_cn: 产量, 输出, 输出量
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+put放,摆→放出,输出→产量
out出去.过时,外面+rage怒气→怒气外露→粗暴
out出去.过时,外面+set安置好→在外面放置好→开端
out出去.过时,外面+skirt裙子;引申为城市周边+s→郊区
out出去.过时,外面+work工作→户外工作;在工作上胜过
out超过.过度+law法律→超越法律之人
out出去.过时,外面→adv.出外;在外 v.公布
out出去.过时,外面+flow流→流出
out出去.过时,外面+work工作→户外工作;在工作上胜过
out超过.过度+bid出价→出价超出
out超过.过度+do做→做得超出别人
out超过.过度+live活→超过别人活着
out超过.过度+number数量→v.在数量上超过
out超过.过度+wear穿→穿出了[洞]
out超过.过度+wit智慧→机智超出别人

means.word_mean: 以智取胜, 以计击败

sentences.en: The criminal outwitted the police and escaped.
sentences.cn: 那罪犯耍花招瞒过了警察, 逃跑了。
